name: Dapper - HolySmoke Genesis - Figurado Box-Pressed
additionalNotes: Founded in 2013 by cigar impresario Ian Reith, the Dapper Cigar Company, LLC is known for making boutique cigars. Based in California, the company’s number one goal is to create premium cigars that offer a consistency in taste and construction. Their first release was the Cubo, which started out as a small batch cigar to be shared among Reith’s friends and families. When it started to develop a large following, Reith started to produce it on a greater scale. In addition to the Cubo, the Dapper Cigar Co. offers the following lines: El Borracho, Devalido, La Madrina, Siempre, Union Break.
